about_the_game:
GAMEPLAY & FEATURES

  • Localized for Steam based on the 2019 Android release

  • Multi-choice, single-ending VN with 10+ hours till credits

  • Award-winning Destiny Star Girlfriend third installment

  • Spacey visual effects, CG artwork, and anime-style sprites

  • Star-studded cast of professional Japanese voice talent

STORY

Spring 2019—the first year of Reiwa—but even as Japan rings in a new era, nothing ever changes for Seiji and his sleepy student ways. Aside from the arrival of new hottie Maja, who joined his class in the winter, each month so far has proven to be as brain-numbingly dull as the last. Until...

One fateful night, a mystery assassin shows up to literally suck out Seiji’s life force! His would-be killer is none other than Kanoko, a second-year at the academy—and a covert magical girl tasked with protecting humans against monsters from deep space. It all seems to trace back to a tragedy in Kanoko’s past when a powerful Majin massacred her family... so why target a complete nobody like Seiji?

To complicate matters, the Starry Sky Council is investigating an anomaly in Kanoko’s body, which means she and Seiji must move in together until further notice. But with Kanoko’s usual ice-cold retorts betraying some decidedly vulnerable weak spots, what will become of Seiji’s sanity this time around—and Kanoko’s? Find out in this third and final(?) installment of Destiny Star Girlfriend!

CHARACTERS

Kanoko Satake

Yuki Nekomura

A Stars bearing the name “Sadalmelik.” Though still a sophomore, her Stars skills already surpass some of the organization’s best.

She possesses exceptional skills, but her aloof demeanor and difficulty in socializing make her something of an enigmatic presence. Obsessed with her campus senior Yuuri as her magical-girl master and mentor, she devotes her time off to serving her every whim. Amazing in the kitchen and a wizard at domestic chores.

Maja and Petra are now also colleagues in the same organization.

“Me? With a lover? I couldn’t begin to imagine that...”

(Heroine of Destiny Star Girlfriend 3. Route not available in games 1 and 2.)

Majin Kanoko

Yuki Nekomura

Kanoko... as a Majin?!

Boasts mind-blowing magical powers and greater combat prowess. With her desires awakened and unleashed, she is bolder about her ambitions, yet her devoted qualities remain strangely intact...

Read Kanoko’s route in 3 to discover her origin story.

“Being set free has made me quite honest, hehehe...”

Yuuri Kamiizumi

Ichigo Momoi

A First-Class Stars bearing the name “Rigel.” As an expert manipulator of all things light magic, she pulverizes demons to dust with overwhelming baseball-themed finesse.

Popular on campus for her cute looks and nice-girl undercover persona. Beneath the mask, while still upbeat and generous, she can be conceited and a sore loser who often gets stuck on one-upping others. For all her bluster, it doesn’t take much to crack her defenses.

“I gotta say, as Kanoko’s master, I’m kinda pumped about this one.”

(Heroine of Destiny Star Girlfriend. Route not available in games 2 and 3.)

Maja Krienke

Ion Momoyama

A young woman scouted and contracted by a Majin under mysterious circumstances, she has dedicated herself to the dark arts—and wields a mean sword to boot.

Persuaded by Yuuri and the others, she has since severed ties with demonkind and joined the Starry Sky Council alongside her “little sister,” Petra. Seriously single-minded, her reliability in a pinch earned her the respect of allies in her hometown, although she can still be absent-minded at times.

“I will give it my all as a member of the Starry Sky Council.”

(Heroine of Destiny Star Girlfriend 2. Route not available in games 1 and 3.)

Petra Grün

Yuka Kotorii

An underclassman hailing from Maja’s native hometown. Thinks the world of her “big sister,” preferring to stick by her side at all times.

Aptly described as a rowdy, excitable puppy, even by those who know her. Gritty, chatty, chronically unshy, and an unapologetic icebreaker—all probably thanks to a wilder childhood than most.

“Yeah, this time I’m just one of the gang from the get-go!”

Fujiko Yonamine

Yuuha Nitta

A retired Stars who bore the name “Ancha.” An active member of the Starry Sky Council’s East Kanagawa Branch. Revered for her powerful healing magic since her demon-vanquishing days, she continues to provide support spells while devoting her time to guiding the next generation of Stars.

Has her fair share of airhead moments, but is overall a mild-mannered pacifist. Chestily vaunted campus-wide.

“I might not look it, but I’m a former Stars. Count on me next!”

content_descriptors.notes: Contains occasional crude humor, crass language, sexual innuendo, and references to battles between humans and demons. All love interests are 18 years of age or older.

name: Destiny Star Girlfriend 3

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Multicore 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 1.0 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 128 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Multicore 2.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2.0 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 256 MB or more
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c

short_description: In the final(?) route of this award-winning VN series, Seiji survives an attempt on his life by Kanoko, aka secret magical girl no. 3. The leads all point to a childhood tragedy and a certain deep-space Majin, so why him? And will Kanoko leave the dark side to save Seiji—and mankind—from herself?
